verses.verse: כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- When תֵצֵ֨א <WH3318> te-Tze When thou goest out לַמִּלְחָמָ֜ה <WH4421> lam-mil-cha-Mah to battle עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against אֹיְבֶ֗יךָ <WH341> 'o-ye-Vei-cha, against thine enemies וְֽרָאִ֜יתָ <WH7200> ve-ra-'I-ta and seest ס֤וּס <WH5483> sus horses וָרֶ֙כֶב֙ <WH7393> va-Re-chev and chariots עַ֚ם <WH5971> 'am [and] a people רַ֣ב <WH7227> rav more מִמְּךָ֔ <WH4480> mi-me-Cha, than לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo do תִירָ֖א <WH3372> ti-Ra than thou be not afraid מֵהֶ֑ם <WH1992> me-Hem; like כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- When יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of them for the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> 'im-Mach, with הַמַּֽעַלְךָ֖ <WH5927> ham-ma-'al-Cha [is] with thee which brought thee up מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וְהָיָ֕ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become כְּקָֽרָבְכֶ֖ם <WH7126> ke-ka-ra-ve-Chem And it shall be when ye are come nigh אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> ham-mil-cha-Mah; unto the battle וְנִגַּ֥שׁ <WH5066> ve-nig-Gash shall approach הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen that the priest וְדִבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> ve-dib-Ber and speak אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> ha-'Am. unto the people

וְאָמַ֤ר <WH559> ve-'a-Mar And shall say אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> 'a-le-Hem to שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> she-Ma' unto them Hear יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, O Israel אַתֶּ֨ם <WH859> 'at-Tem ye קְרֵבִ֥ים <WH7131> ke-re-Vim ye approach הַיּ֛וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom this day לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> lam-mil-cha-Mah unto battle עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against אֹיְבֵיכֶ֑ם <WH341> 'o-ye-vei-Chem; against your enemies אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay יֵרַ֣ךְ <WH7401> ye-Rach faint לְבַבְכֶ֗ם <WH3824> le-vav-Chem, let not your hearts אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּֽירְא֧וּ <WH3372> ti-re-'U fear וְאַֽל־ <WH408> ve-'al- not תַּחְפְּז֛וּ <WH2648> tach-pe-Zu not and do not tremble וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- not תַּֽעַרְצ֖וּ <WH6206> ta-'ar-Tzu neither be ye terrified מִפְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> mip-pe-nei-Hem. because

כִּ֚י <WH3588> ki for יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh For the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem, your God הַהֹלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> ha-ho-Lech [is] he that goeth עִמָּכֶ֑ם <WH5973> 'im-ma-Chem; against לְהִלָּחֵ֥ם <WH3898> le-hil-la-Chem with you to fight לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- against אֹיְבֵיכֶ֖ם <WH341> 'o-ye-vei-Chem for you against your enemies לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <WH3467> le-ho-Shi-a' to save אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853> 'et-Chem.

וְדִבְּר֣וּ <WH1696> ve-dib-be-Ru shall speak הַשֹּֽׁטְרִים֮ <WH7860> hash-sho-te-Rim And the officers אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> ha-'Am unto the people לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> le-Mor saying מִֽי־ <WH4310> mi- Who הָאִ֞ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish What man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that בָּנָ֤ה <WH1129> ba-Nah [is there] that hath built בַֽיִת־ <WH1004> va-yit- house חָדָשׁ֙ <WH2319> cha-Dash a new וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo not חֲנָכ֔וֹ <WH2596> cha-na-Cho, and hath not dedicated יֵלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> ye-Lech depart וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <WH7725> ve-ya-Sho and return לְבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> le-vei-To; to his house פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- otherwise יָמוּת֙ <WH4191> ya-Mut lest he die בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> bam-mil-cha-Mah, in the battle וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> ve-'Ish man אַחֵ֖ר <WH312> 'a-Cher and another יַחְנְכֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH2596> yach-ne-Chen-nu. dedicate

וְיָסְפ֣וּ <WH3254> ve-ya-se-Fu further הַשֹּׁטְרִים֮ <WH7860> hash-sho-te-Rim And the officers לְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> le-dab-Ber shall speak אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָעָם֒ <WH5971> ha-'Am unto the people וְאָמְר֗וּ <WH559> ve-'a-me-Ru, and they shall say מִי־ <WH4310> mi- Who הָאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish What man הַיָּרֵא֙ <WH3373> hai-ya-Re [is there that is] fearful וְרַ֣ךְ <WH7390> ve-Rach faint הַלֵּבָ֔ב <WH3824> hal-le-Vav, heart יֵלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> ye-Lech along וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <WH7725> ve-ya-Sho and return לְבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> le-vei-To; unto his house וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo not יִמַּ֛ס <WH4549> yim-Mas faint אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- לְבַ֥ב <WH3824> le-Vav as well as his heart אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> 'e-Chav lest his brethren's כִּלְבָבֽוֹ׃ <WH3824> kil-va-Vo. hearts

וְהָיָ֛ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become כְּכַלֹּ֥ת <WH3615> ke-chal-Lot have made an end הַשֹּׁטְרִ֖ים <WH7860> hash-sho-te-Rim And it shall be when the officers לְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> le-dab-Ber of speaking אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> ha-'Am; unto the people וּפָ֥קְד֛וּ <WH6485> u-Fa-ke-Du that they shall make שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> sa-Rei captains צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot of the armies בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> be-Rosh to lead הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> ha-'Am. the people ס sa-Mek

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo does not תַשְׁלִים֙ <WH7999> tash-Lim And if it will make no peace עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> 'im-Mach, against וְעָשְׂתָ֥ה <WH6213> ve-'a-se-Tah with thee but will make עִמְּךָ֖ <WH5973> 'im-me-Cha against מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> mil-cha-Mah; war וְצַרְתָּ֖ <WH6696> ve-tzar-Ta against thee then thou shalt besiege עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha. and

וּנְתָנָ֛הּ <WH5414> u-ne-ta-Nah hath delivered יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And when the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> be-ya-De-cha; it into thine hands וְהִכִּיתָ֥ <WH5221> ve-hik-ki-Ta thou shalt smite אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all זְכוּרָ֖הּ <WH2138> ze-chu-Rah every male לְפִי־ <WH6310> le-fi- thereof with the edge חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> Cha-rev. of the sword

רַ֣ק <WH7535> rak but הַ֠נָּשִׁים <WH802> Han-na-shim But the women וְהַטַּ֨ף <WH2945> ve-hat-Taf and the little ones וְהַבְּהֵמָ֜ה <WH929> ve-hab-be-he-Mah and the cattle וְכֹל֩ <WH3605> ve-Chol and all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh is in בָעִ֛יר <WH5892> va-'Ir and all that is in the city כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all שְׁלָלָ֖הּ <WH7998> she-la-Lah [even] all the spoil תָּבֹ֣ז <WH962> ta-Voz thereof shalt thou take לָ֑ךְ Lach; וְאָֽכַלְתָּ֙ <WH398> ve-'a-chal-Ta unto thyself and thou shalt eat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁלַ֣ל <WH7998> she-Lal the spoil אֹיְבֶ֔יךָ <WH341> 'o-ye-Vei-cha, of thine enemies אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֛ן <WH5414> na-Tan hath given יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> ken Thus תַּעֲשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh Thus shalt thou do לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol to all הֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim, unto all the cities הָרְחֹקֹ֥ת <WH7350> ha-re-cho-Kot far off מִמְּךָ֖ <WH4480> mi-me-Cha that מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me-'Od; [which are] very אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- are not מֵעָרֵ֥י <WH5892> me-'a-Rei [are] not of the cities הַגּֽוֹיִם־ <WH1471> hag-go-yim- of these nations הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh of these הֵֽנָּה׃ <WH2007> Hen-nah. from thee which

רַ֗ק <WH7535> Rak, in מֵעָרֵ֤י <WH5892> me-'a-Rei But of the cities הָֽעַמִּים֙ <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim of these people הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh, of these אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher that יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> no-Ten doth give לְךָ֖ le-Cha נַחֲלָ֑ה <WH5159> na-cha-Lah; thee [for] an inheritance לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo shall not תְחַיֶּ֖ה <WH2421> te-chai-Yeh thou shalt save alive כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- anything נְשָׁמָֽה׃ <WH5397> ne-sha-Mah. nothing that breatheth

לְמַ֗עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an, so אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- may not יְלַמְּד֤וּ <WH3925> ye-lam-me-Du That they teach אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> 'et-Chem לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot, you not to do כְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> ke-Chol to all תּֽוֹעֲבֹתָ֔ם <WH8441> to-'a-vo-Tam, after all their abominations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עָשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> 'a-Su which they have done לֵֽאלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> le-lo-hei-Hem; unto their gods וַחֲטָאתֶ֖ם <WH2398> va-cha-ta-Tem so should ye sin לַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh against the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God ס sa-Mek
